PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-06512022-06-10,  ,  ,  ,  ESDC, 
ActCanada Student Loans Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Loans Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS in order to (1) amend the definitions of permanent disability and severe permanent disability; (2) add a new definition for persistent or prolonged disability; and (3) amend the definitions of full-time student and part-time student.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0132 Publication Date: 2022-06-22
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Student Loans Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS in order to (1) amend the definitions of permanent disability and severe permanent disability; (2) add a new definition for persistent or prolonged disability; and (3) amend the definitions of full-time student and part-time student.
